name: Isaac
descriptions: Isaac is a member of the Gun Runners at the Gun Runner headquarters in 2281.
Isaac has been working for the Gun Runners as a supply manager for around five years. One first encounters him when they reach the trading kiosk outside of the Gun Runner compound.
Dealing with Contreras: Isaac will need the Courier to bring back 100 pieces of metal in order to manufacture the wares Contreras asks for. This can also be completed by using Speech 80 or Barter 80.
PC Playstation 3 Xbox 360 After Isaac enters his home, he may not exit it again.

topics.response_text: I don't handle buying and selling for the Gun Runners. Talk to the robot in the kiosk near our factory.

topics.topic_text: So you work for the Gun Runners?
topics.response_text: For around five years now. I handle the supply ends of things - raw materials and stuff.
Makers of the finest high-grade weapons and ammunition in the wasteland.

topics.topic_text: Contreras sent me. McCarran needs a lot more guns and ammo.
topics.response_text: Shit. Is he serious? The 25% increase in weapons is doable, but a 50% increase in ammunition is nuts.

topics.topic_text: Arrange a temporary supply deal with other merchants. It'll still lead to a profit for you.
topics.response_text: [SUCCEEDED] I guess we'll have to.  If Caesar's Legion drives the NCR from the area, there goes ninety percent of our business.

topics.topic_text: Gun Runners are skilled enough to refurbish weapons like new, right? You're overthinking this.
topics.response_text: [SUCCEEDED] You're right.  I suppose we could refurbish used and damaged weapons to fill the order.

topics.topic_text: Never mind. Let's talk about something else.
Maybe I could help you out with those supplies.
topics.response_text: Well, I guess so.  Look.  We just need metal, and lots of it.

topics.topic_text: Any chance I could get a tour of the Gun Runner factory?
topics.response_text: None whatsoever. Everything inside the fence is off-limits, and the guards have strict orders to shoot to kill.

topics.topic_text: I've got some scrap for you.
Do you have enough scrap metal yet?
Who's in charge of the Gun Runners?
topics.response_text: Out here, we don't have bosses. Me, the gunsmiths, and the guards all know what we're supposed to be doing.
